snippet: KAYE--Judith. Downstate New York Committee of the American College of Trial Lawyers mourn the passing of our cherished Fellow, Honorable Judith S. Kaye, who set an example for all Lawyers and Judges to follow. Judith simply was a passionate friend of equality and justice. Larry Krantz, Chairman, Downstate NY Committee 1/3
lead_paragraph: KAYE--Judith. Downstate New York Committee of the American College of Trial Lawyers mourn the passing of our cherished Fellow, Honorable Judith S. Kaye, who set an example for all Lawyers and Judges to follow. Judith simply was a passionate friend of equality and justice. Larry Krantz, Chairman, Downstate NY Committee 1/3
